title: Calories in a Frozen Yogurt
meta_description: Learn calories in a frozen yogurt serving, including carbs, sugars, protein, fat breakdown, and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Plain, low-fat frozen yogurt; standard serving size ~100 g (about 1/2 cup); no added toppings or mix-ins.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, flavors, serving size, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A serving of low-fat frozen yogurt provides ~120 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a frozen yogurt serving?
faqs.a: About 120 kcal for a 100 g serving of plain low-fat frozen yogurt.
